name: Name TODO

quote-allie: Have you heard of freesewing.org? It’s pretty much the greatest thing ever! TODO
quote-allie-about: Author of sewing blog The Aspiring Seamstress. TODO
quote-ivan: Kudos to @j__st for creating @freesewing_org an open source platform for made-to-measure sewing patterns and general awesomeness TODO
quote-ivan-about: Kubernetes London Meetup co-organiser. Founder of Kube.camp TODO
quote-jamie: With Freesewing, sewing has moved into the 21st century TODO
quote-jamie-about: Author of the popular sewing blog Male Devon Sewing and 2016 Great British Sewing Bee contestant. TODO
removeAllMyModelData: Remove all my model data TODO
selectThePartsYouWantIncludedInYourDraft: Select the parts you want included in your draft TODO
sewingPatternsForNonAveragePeople: Sewing patterns for non-average people TODO
signUpForAFreeAccount: Sign up for a free account TODO
signingUpOnlyTakesAMinute: Signing up only takes a minute TODO
signup--text: This should not happen. Please help us out by creating an issue on GitHub TODO
signup-invalid_input-text: Please enter a valid email address, and a password TODO
signup-no_such_pending_confirmation-text: Sorry, but that is not a confirmation code we have on record? Perhaps it expired, in which case you can just sign up again. TODO
signup-no_such_pending_confirmation-titl: There's no such pending confirmation TODO
signup-signup_pending-text: We already have a pending activation for this email address. We have sent you a fresh copy of the activation email in case you missed the original one. TODO
signup-signup_pending-title: Your signup is pending activation TODO
signup-success-text: We've sent you an email at {email}. TODO
signup-user_exists-text: We already have a user with that email address. Perhaps you'd like to login instead? TODO
thereIsNoWayBackFromThis: There is no way back from this. TODO
thisContentIsNotAvailableInLanguage: This content is not available in English. TODO
thisDraftPredatesThisFeature: This draft predates this feature. TODO
thisIsTheCurrentStatusOfOurTranslations: This is the current status of our translations. TODO
thisPageIsNotIntendedForLoggedInUsers: This page is not intended for logged-in users TODO
thisPageIsOnlyAvailableToFreesewingUsers: This page is only available to Freesewing users TODO
title: Titel
txt-avatarDropzoneText: Drag and drop an image here, or click the button to pick one from your files. TODO
txt-breastMeasurement-text: This is one of those measurements that is only relevant if your model has breasts. TODO
txt-breastMeasurement-title: This measurement is only relevant for breasts TODO
txt-changeRequiresConfirmation: This change requires confirmation via E-mail TODO
txt-clickEmailLink: Please click the link in the email to continue. TODO
txt-consentModel: Do you give your consent to process your model data? TODO
txt-consentModelAnswerWhat: For each model their measurements, breasts settings, and password. TODO
txt-consentModelAnswerWhatOptional: Optional: A model picture and the name that you give your model. TODO
txt-consentModelAnswerWhy: To draft made-to-measure sewing patterns, we need body measurements. TODO
txt-consentModelObjectNote: Note: Freesewing publishes anonymized measurements as open data for scientific research. TODO
txt-consentModelObjectWhy: This data is anonymous and used to study and understand the human form in all its shapes, so we can get better sewing patterns, and better fitting garments. TODO
txt-consentProfile: Do you give your consent to process your profile data? TODO
txt-consentProfileAnswerTiming: 12 months after your last login, or until you remove your account or revoke this consent. TODO
txt-consentProfileAnswerWhatOptional: Optional: A profile picture, and social media accounts TODO
txt-consentProfileAnswerWhy: To authenticate you, contact you when needed, and build a community. TODO
txt-consentProfileQuestionShare: Do we share it with others? TODO
txt-consentProfileQuestionTiming: How long do we keep it? TODO
txt-consentProfileQuestionWhy: Why do we need it? TODO
txt-contentLocaleFallback: That's why we're showing you the English version instead. TODO
txt-contentNotTranslated: Unfortunately, this page has not (yet) been translated to {language}. TODO
txt-dataExport: If you like, we can export all the data we have stored for you. TODO
txt-dataExportQueued: You data export has been queued. We'll send you an E-mail once it's ready with a download link. TODO
txt-didYouSpotATypo: Did you spot a typo? Do you feel something is missing, or needs clarification? TODO
txt-doYouObject: Do you object to using your anonymized data for scientific research? TODO
txt-editThisPageOnline: You can edit this page online and submit your changes. TODO
txt-email-sharing: We'll never share your email with anyone else TODO
txt-emailChangeConfirmationNotFound: Sorry, but we have no pending E-mail change for this confirmation code. Perhaps it expired, in which case you can simply make the change again in your settings. TODO
txt-emailNotFound: If you can't find the email, check your spam folder, or contact us. TODO
txt-emailWillWorkToo: If you don't know your @:username, your @:emailAddress will work too TODO
txt-footer:
Freesewing is made by Joost De Cock & contributors
with the financial support of our Patrons TODO
txt-forgot-login: Enter your username or E-mail address below and click the @:resetPassword button TODO
txt-gdpr-1: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union (EU) protects your personal data from unscrupulous data hoarders. That's a good thing. TODO
txt-gdpr-2: One of the things it imposes is for us to get your consent — in other words, your permission — to process your personal data. TODO
txt-gdpr-3: Without your consent, we have no legal basis to process your data and have no choice but to remove it. TODO
txt-gdprCompliant: Freesewing.org respects your privacy and your rights. We apply the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union (EU). TODO
txt-homepage-community: Everything is run by voluntary contributors. There is no commercial entity behind, or attached to, this project. TODO
txt-homepage-draft: Choose from one of your patterns, choose a model, and pick your options. We'll do the rest. TODO
txt-homepage-join: Join thousands of others and sign up for a free account on freesewing.org. TODO
txt-homepage-model: All our patterns are made-to-measure. So first thing to do is grab your measuring tape. TODO
txt-homepage-opensource: Our platform, our patterns, and even this website. All our code is available on GitHub. Pull requests welcome! TODO
txt-homepage-patrons: Freesewing is made possible by the financial support of our Patrons. They keep this ship afloat. TODO
txt-joinTheTranslationTeam1: Even if you have never contributed to an open source project, translation is a smooth on-ramp towards contributor fame. TODO
txt-joinTheTranslationTeam2: It doesn't matter whether you translate a few words or sentences, or tackle an entire language by yourself. Every contribution counts, and many hands make light work. TODO
txt-joinTheTranslationTeam3: Read the documentation for translators to get started. Don't worry, it's easy. TODO
txt-missingBlogPosts: Not all blog posts have been translated to English — but you could change that TODO
txt-modelsWithMissingMeasurements: These models lack some of the required measurements to draft this pattern: TODO
txt-newModel: To get started, please give your model a name. TODO
txt-password-policy: We don't enforce a password policy TODO
txt-passwordRecoverConfirmationNotFound: Sorry, but we have no pending password recovery for this confirmation code. Perhaps it expired, in which case you can simply make another request. TODO
txt-resend: You can sign up again with the same E-mail address, and we'll send you a new confirmation message. TODO
txt-saOption-patternImperial: Pattern default imperial seam allowance TODO
txt-saOption-patternMetric: Pattern default metric seam allowance TODO
txt-signup-step1: Enter your email address, and pick a password. TODO
txt-signup-step3: Give us permission to process your personal data. TODO
txt-slogan: An open source platform for made-to-measure sewing patterns TODO
txt-translators1: We are looking for people to help with our translation efforts. TODO
txt-translators2: Many hands make light work, and it's excellent karma to make a contribution this way. TODO
txt-translators3: To learn more about what you can do, and how to do it, click the link below. TODO
txt-warningDataRestriction: Once we restrict your account, you won't be able to undo this yourself. To regain access to your account, you will have to contact us. TODO
txt-warningModelData: This will remove all of your models, and all of your drafts. TODO
txt-warningProfileData: This will remove all of your models, all of your drafts, all of your comments, and your account. Everything will be gone. TODO
txt-withOrWithoutBreasts: Fitting breasts requires a bunch of extra measurements that are not relevant if you don't have breasts. If you indicate your model does not have breasts, we won't show you these measurements as they are irrelevant. If you're not sure what to pick, go for breasts. TODO
txt-withOrWithoutBreasts-explainer: On other websites, this question may be phrased as 'male or female?'. Here, we don't like putting people in boxes. All we care about is fitting your chest. TODO
userHasBeenWithUsSince: {user} has been with us since {since} TODO
weAreLoadingDataFromTheBackend: We are loading data from the backend TODO
weAreValidatingYourConfirmationCode: We are validating your confirmation code TODO
weCantHelpYouWithThis: We can't help you with this TODO
youCanUseMarkdownFormatting: You can use MarkDown formatting TODO
youDoNotObjectToSharingAnonymizedDataFor: You do not object to sharing anonymized data for research TODO
youHaveTheRightToObjectToThis: You have the right to object to this TODO
youObjectToSharingAnonymizedDataForResea: You object to sharing anonymized data for research TODO
centerBackNeckToWaist: Hintere Mitte vom Hals bis zur Taille TODO
highPointShoulderToBust: Höchster Punkt der Schulter zur Brust TODO
naturalWaistToUnderbust: Natürliche Taille bis zum Unterbrustumfang TODO

aaron.description: Aaron ist ein sportliches Shirt oder ein Tank Top.
aaron.title: Shirt Aaron

benjamin.description: Benjamin ist eine Schleife - oder Fliege - mit vier unterschiedlichen Formoptionen.
benjamin.title: Schleife Benjamin

bent.description: Dieser zweiteilige Armschnitt ist die Grundlage für insere Mäntel- und Jackenschnitte.
bent.title: Grundschnitt Bent

brian.description: Brian ist eine Grundschnitt für Männer.
brian.title: Grundschnitt Brian

bruce.description: Bruce sind bequeme und stylische Retroshorts.
bruce.title: Retroshorts Bruce

carlita.description: Die Damenversion unseres Carlton-Mantels, aka Sherlock Holmes Mantel.
carlita.title: Mantel Carlita

carlton.description: Für Sherlock Holmes Cosplay, or nur ein wirklich hübscher Mantel.
carlton.title: Mantel Carlton Coat

cathrin.description: Cathrin ist ein Unterbrustkorsett oder Taillentrainer.
cathrin.title: Korsett Cathrin

florent.description: Florent ist eine abgerundete Schiebermütze mit einem kleinen festen Schild an der Vorderseite.
florent.title: Schiebermütze Florent

huey.description: Huey ist ein Hoodie mit Reißverschluss und mit optionalen Taschen auf der Vorderseite.
huey.title: Hoodie Huey

hugo.description: Hugo ist ein Kapuzensweatshirt mit Raglanärmeln.
hugo.title: Hoodie Hugo

jaeger.description: Jeager ist ein sportliches Sakko mit zwei Knöpfen und aufgesetzten Taschen.
jaeger.title: Sakko Jaeger

simon.description: Simon ist ein sehr anpassungsfähiger Hemdenschnitt für Männer.
simon.title: Hemd Simon

tamiko.description: Tamiko ist ein Zero Waste Top.
tamiko.title: Tamiko Top

theo.description: Theo ist Theodore - mit einem schmaleren Schnitt.
theo.title: Hose Theo

theodore.description: Theodore ist eine klassische Hose nach dem (Aldrich) Lehrbuch.
theodore.title: Hose Theodore

trayvon.description: Trayvon ist eine Krawatte, die keine Abkürzungen für ein professionelles Ergebnis nimmt.
trayvon.title: Krawatte Trayvon

wahid.description: Wahid ist eine klassische taillierte Weste.
wahid.title: Weste Wahid

princessSeamSmoothFactor.description: Controls how sharply the princess seam will correct once it's passed the fullness of your breasts. A high factor will smooth the curve, resulting in a less fitted coat that's easier to sew. A low factor will sharpen the curve, resulting in a harder to sew seam, and a more fitted coat. TODO
princessSeamSmoothFactor.title: Princess seam smooth factor TODO
